data.title: Norwich Area Code
data.meta_description: Expand, establish, and grow your business presence by getting a local number in the Norwich area. Learn more!
data.text:
The Norwich area code did not start out as the 1603 area code. Its original area code was 0605. The Norwich area code needed to be changed into a new area code format to provide additional phone numbers to the dwindling stock. It was during the PhONEday event in 1995 that the Norwich area code was modified into the 1603 area code.

On PhONEday, different regions of the United Kingdom were given a new area code format of their own. In most regions the number 1 was inserted to the previous area code. "1" was to precede the original area codes and just after the trunk code 0. This change has increased the length of the former area codes by a single digit. It expanded the Norwich area code from previously being made up of 3-digits into a 4-figure long area code.

But even before PhONEday, the Norwich area code had modified its original area code 0605 into area code 0603. This area code was the one that was added with the number 1 when PhONEday came about. This created the 1603 area code instead of 1605. Area code 1605 is currently not in use. Area code 1603 is the current area code of Norwich. It is also used by nearby cities and communities of Norwich such as Barnham, Broom, Drayton and Buxton, among many others.

The length of Norwich local numbers is based on the area code format assigned to it on PhONEday. The format assigned to Norwich was (0XXXX) XX XXXX. This format is used by several regions of the United Kingdom. The X's inside the parentheses symbolizes the area code 1603 respectively, while those outside represents the Norwich local numbers. In this area code pattern, there are 4 figures that compose the area code including the digit 1 and 6 numerals for the Norwich local numbers.

Changes in the area code such as the ones that have been mentioned are causing problems to the telecommunication such as misdirected calls. Callers that fail to key in the correct telephone numbers would have calls that will be connected to another company. An instance such as this would frustrate some clients. The company of which the call was intended to be made would be losing a call due to a minor mistake in inputting the telephone numbers.

Organizations that are dependent on their telecommunications will be the ones that would be greatly affected by these aforementioned situations. Instances like these would possibly result to lost customers and profits.

These problems can all be avoided through the help of a business phone system from RingCentral. Their telecommunications system will provide your company with a virtual number that is not affected any geographical constraints as compared to contact numbers that employ area codes.

RingCentral also gives your phone system a dial-by-name directory feature. This enables your customer to instantly reach anybody within your company by mentioning a first or a last name. It gives your clients convenience when contacting you or any of your employees. Furthermore, this feature can be incorporated unto the extensions that RingCentral will provide for your company.

Included in the extensions are mobile phones and home phones. These phones are now able to receive calls, messages and faxes. Calls can also be forwarded to these communication devices. It helps guarantee that all calls will be received and properly addressed by the proper individuals concerned.
